title: Cash Cobain and OnlyHeaven Link Up for New Song “Sick N Tired”: Listen
description: The New York and New Orleans rappers unite for a bounce-inspired track
author: Matthew Strauss
excerpt: The New York and New Orleans rappers unite for a bounce-inspired track
text: New York rapper and producer Cash Cobain has shared a new song featuring New Orleans bounce artist OnlyHeaven. Listen to the Cobain-produced “Sick N Tired” below.“Sick N Tired” follows Cash Cobain’s February single with Bay Swag and Rob49, “Trippin on a Yacht.” He recently spoke with People about his plans for his follow-up projects to Play Cash Cobain.OnlyHeaven shared her KISS (Keep It Short & Sweet) EP in February. Check out Alphonse Pierre’s recent conversation with OnlyHeaven, “An Interview With OnlyHeaven, the Hopeless Romantic of New Orleans Bounce.”
html:
New York rapper and producer Cash Cobain has shared a new song featuring New Orleans bounce artist OnlyHeaven. Listen to the Cobain-produced “Sick N Tired” below.

“Sick N Tired” follows Cash Cobain’s February single with Bay Swag and Rob49, “Trippin on a Yacht.” He recently spoke with People about his plans for his follow-up projects to Play Cash Cobain.

OnlyHeaven shared her KISS (Keep It Short & Sweet) EP in February. Check out Alphonse Pierre’s recent conversation with OnlyHeaven, “An Interview With OnlyHeaven, the Hopeless Romantic of New Orleans Bounce.”
